item.title: Stacy add a quote by david sedaris
item.description: "On a busy day twenty-two thousand people come to visit Santa, and I was told that it is an elf's lot to remain merry in the face of torment and adversity. I promised to keep that in mind." -- david sedaris

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Butch Cassidy
item.description: "Boy, I've got vision and the rest of the world is wearing bi-focals." -- Butch Cassidy

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You are my best friend as well as my lover, and I do not know which side of you I enjoy the most. I treasure each side, just as I have treasured our life together." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Stacy add a quote by Morgan Matson
item.description: "Tomorrow will be better.” “But what if it’s not?” I asked. “Then you say it again tomorrow. Because it might be. You never know, right? At some point, tomorrow will be better." -- Morgan Matson
